name: carads
description: A platform where Client, Supplier, and Car owners do ads on Car

scripts.setup: npm run clean-composer ; npm run reset-fabric && npm run start-fabric && npm run create-peeradmin && npm run init && npm run start-network && npm run import-card && npm run ping-network
scripts.clean-docker: docker stop $(docker images -q) && docker rm $(docker ps -a -q) && docker rmi $(docker images -q)
scripts.init: rm *.bna ; rm *.card ; composer archive create --sourceType dir --sourceName . && composer network install --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 --archiveFile carads@$npm_package_version.bna
scripts.start-network: composer network start --networkName carads --networkVersion $npm_package_version --networkAdmin admin --networkAdminEnrollSecret adminpw --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1
scripts.upgrade: rm *.bna ; composer archive create --sourceType dir --sourceName . && composer network install --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1 --archiveFile carads@$npm_package_version.bna && composer network upgrade --networkName carads --networkVersion $npm_package_version --card PeerAdmin@hlfv1
scripts.rest: composer-rest-server -c admin@carads -n always -a false -w true -t false

author: Group1_BC_2018
